1982 janadhipathiwarana apendakayeku lesa rohana sahodarayata polis mulasthanaye pawathwu sakachchawakata sahabhagi karawa ganima ithamath dushkara karyayak wuyeth, kolambaa mahapare payin gaman karaddi polis sthana idiriyen awida yama prathindepa kirima mata therum gatha hakke ee aakarayen pamanaki.

aar amarawira - hitapu anadena niladhari (dakuna) shri lanka nawika hamudawa * riyar admiral jastin jayasuriya - hitapu anadena niladhari (nagenahira) shri lanka nawika hamudawa * nawika komadoru prasanna hewage - ginikona nawika widhanaya bhara niyojya aagnyapathi, hitapu militari atashe (sahakara thanapathi) shri lanka thanapathi karyalaya indiyawa, hitapu nawika niyojya buddhi adhyakshaka * nawika komadoru dhammika samarawikrama - anadena niladhari (dakuna) shri lanka nawika hamudawa * nawika komadoru nawan thennakon - anadena niladhari (thrikunamalaya) shri lanka nawika hamudawa * kamandar asanga lankathilaka - luthinan jenaral densil kobbakaduwa ha thawath hamuda niladharin 6 deneku samaga 8 agosthu 1992 pidana bombayak magin yapanaya kayits dupathadi methumawa ghathanaya kerini.
